name: Flyer VR - fantasy infinite 3D sky Cardboard race
name_original: Flyer VR - fantasy infinite 3D sky Cardboard race
description:
Fly as far as you can!
Virtual Reality game for Cardboard can be played in VR or NON-VR.

2 gameplay types
► Endless runner
► Story of the island

3 amazing flying dino players
► FLYER
► LEAFLET
► GLIDER

3 gorgeous lands
► BEACH
► CAVE
► JUNGLE

3 Power Ups
► Health Restore
► Absorb Shield
► Speed Arrow

Experience adventure with Flyer VR game for Cardboard. Check out what happened on island and help flying dinos back to their nest.
All eggs waiting for them.


--- TOP FEATURES ---
- Beautiful hand-painted environment
- Captivating adventure music
- VR and NON-VR mode
- TWO types of gameplay
- Over 9 maps and one random generated maps in endless runner
- Three different dinosours with upgrades capabilities
- Over 60 achievements
- 3 leaderboards to compare online
- 3 Power Ups
- Many obstacles
- Hours of gameplay

One of the first VR game supporting Cardboard and many BOX devices.

- Requirements and notes -
To better experience use headphones.
Not all devices can run Virtual Reality mode, you need to have gyroscope, accelerometer and good performance!
